author: admin
title: Reggae lovers celebrate Bob Marley’s birthday in Nairobi – PHOTOS – Nairobi News (satire) (press release) (blog)
text:
Reggae lovers celebrate Bob Marley’s birthday in Nairobi – PHOTOS Posted on Feb 5, 2017 3955 Views Revelers who jammed Spree Club in Nairobi to celebrate Bob Marley's-birthday. PHOTO | HILARY KIMUYU By HILARY KIMUYU, @hilarykimuyu 
Thirty six years after his death, the legacy of legendary reggae singer Bob Marley lives on. On Saturday night, reggae lovers in Nairobi crowded Spree Club to commemorate king of reggae’s birthday. 
A birthday anniversary celebrations in honour of Marley were held across town and another one is scheduled for Sunday at Scratch Club. 
Bob Marley was born on February 6, 1945 in St Ann, Jamaica and would have been 72 on Monday. DJ Mantell entertains reggae lovers on at Spree Club in Nairobi during the celebrations of Bob Marley’s birthday. PHOTO | HILARY KIMUYU 
The show was organized by renowned DJ family The Agugu Family, Yayo’s Mobile among other sponsors. On Saturday revelers jammed Spree Club and the DJ’s did not disappoint. 
The main DJ of the night, DJ Mantell, said it was an honor to be at the club celebrating a legend because of the messages of love and unity that his music espoused. 
A cake decorated in Rastafarian colours and image of Bob Marley was cut and and shared out. Ancent Mumo (left) of The Agugu Family holds a birthday cake with other revelers during the Bob Marley birthday celebrations. PHOTO | HILARY KIMUYU Latest Stories
